duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive sales for new tires in the replacement market for commercial trucks and trailers through consultative selling and promotion of new technologies and services.
Maintain and grow existing accounts, prospect new customers, and integrate sales with promotion of new technologies and services.
Conduct regular site visits, sales calls, and site visits to maintain sales activity and develop strong relationships with customers and dealers.
Own the launch process of new products and services for successful integration into the product line.
Monitor progress and adjust strategy by conducting market analysis and forecasting.
Resolve operational and administrative issues, respond to inquiries, and prepare routine and special reports as required by management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree and 1-3+ years of sales experience OR high school degree and 3-6+ years related sales experience
